title: #124: The Impeachment Saga Continues, SCOTUS Takes Up 2A Case, Ellen DeGeneres Canceled?
text: It's a tremendous Tuesday, and Matt and Storm are back to bring the latest impeachment news, a 2020 Election update, and developments concerning your right to keep and bear arms. Today, the guys address the State Department blocking the ambassador to the EU from testifying to House Democrats and the Supreme Court taking up its first Second Amendment case in more than a decade. They also discuss Ellen DeGeneres' defense of her friendship with former President George W. Bush after the pair were seen chatting during a Dallas Cowboys football game.
description: It's a tremendous Tuesday, and Matt and Storm are back
